channel.title: Need help changing the login menu
channel.description: ok i really want to change the login menu, when u log onto the server its the screen that says welcome to ------, i am hosting hellzend....and i added my own npc's/shop items, and so on..and on the login screen it says "Looking for hoster" and other things...i need to change that to something else, PLZ so one email me with a tutorial on how to change that stuff or something my email is, redfoxkt@bellsouth.net (or to help me even easier my windows live messenger address is redfoxkt@hotmail.com) u can either email me or im me with windows live, and another thing i needed help with is the emotes, there is an emote that says "Dive" i wana keep the cords it takes u too....but change the name from "dive" to Admin area" or something ( the reason i really need to change what it says on the log in page is because every one is messenging me with "i will host ur server" and other things, plz some one i really need help changing it ASAP.

item.title: Need help changing the login menu
item.dc:creator: @redfoxkt redfoxkt
item.description:
@redfoxkt wrote:

ok i really want to change the login menu, when u log onto the server its the screen that says welcome to ------, i am hosting hellzend…and i added my own npc’s/shop items, and so on…and on the login screen it says “Looking for hoster” and other things…i need to change that to something else, PLZ so one email me with a tutorial on how to change that stuff or something my email is, redfoxkt@bellsouth.net (or to help me even easier my windows live messenger address is redfoxkt@hotmail.com) u can either email me or im me with windows live, and another thing i needed help with is the emotes, there is an emote that says “Dive” i wana keep the cords it takes u too…but change the name from “dive” to Admin area" or something ( the reason i really need to change what it says on the log in page is because every one is messenging me with “i will host ur server” and other things, plz some one i really need help changing it ASAP.
